name: The Adventures of a Square
description:
This is my first game so I hope you like it.

Instructions and controls

Move: A and D

Jump: Spacebar

Boxes: Brown squares that can be pushed and jumped on.

Jump Pads: Yellow Pads that can boost you in the air with a lot of force or very little force.

Kill blocks: these blocks are pink and will restart the level if you touch them.

Level Finish: The level finish is a green rectangle that sends you to the next level.
